This is a 'list of characters' from the Pixar franchise [[Cars
(franchise)|Cars]] consisting of the 2006 film [[Cars (film)|Cars]], the mini-
series [[Cars Toons: Mater's Tall Tales]] and the 2011 film [[Cars 2]].
